Message:
How strange.
My memories feel faint,
and my mind clouded.

It was then that
Her Holiness called for me...

I am...the Grand Master of
the Knights of Longinus.

I swore undying loyalty to
Her Holiness for saving
my life as a child...

“Your Holiness,
I have exterminated this
witch who dares trespass
against you,”

Yes... Everything shall be done
as Her Holiness wishes...

I was then ordered to
seek out a man in
possession of a magic staff.

He appears to be an evil fiend
spreading disaster throughout
the world with his coven
of witches...

I must dispose of him
immediately...for Her Holiness.
